New Records: India won by 6 wickets, posting 201 for four in 41.2 overs.
Key Match Events: Ishan Kishan attempted an extravagant drive against Mitchell Starc and edged.
Virat Kohli and K.L. Rahul's 165-run partnership for the fourth wicket rescued the hosts from a precarious three wickets for two runs.
Post-Match Reflections: A pulsating Sunday night, oscillating between agony and ecstasy, finally culminated with India commencing its World Cup campaign on a winning note.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won its first ICC World Cup match since 2013.
